description:
OVER 1,000 STUDENTS LEARNING EFFECTIVE, PROFITABLE EMAIL MARKETING FOR THEIR SMALL BUSINESSES!

A BEGINNER'S GUIDE TO EMAIL MARKETING. IN THIS COURSE, YOU WILL...

  • Learn the email marketing software Aweber.
  • Learn WHY it's important to have build up your email list, and how it will benefit your business.
  • Set up your first Aweber email marketing campaign, which includes a sign up form for your website, as well as a follow up message.
  • Learn email marketing tips and strategy.
  • Build valuable, profitable relationships with your audience.
  • Look at informative, telling case studies that will help make your email marketing strategies more effective.
  • Learn email marketing best practices.
  • Learn how to effectively use an autoresponder to engage your audience.
  • Walk away with the following email marketing PDF guides (1) Is Your Email Ready to Send? PDF Checklist, (2) Call to Action Guide, (3) Split Testing PDF Guide, (4) Killer Case Studies of 2013, and (5) a course guide PDF.

In this course, you will set up your first email marketing campaign using Aweber, the leader in email marketing. Out of all of the best email marketing software out there, Aweber is one of the most popular.

Why do so many businesses (including myself) choose Aweber for their email marketing needs? Because they have one of the highest (99%) deliverability rates, excellent tracking and delivery tools, and is often chosen over MailChimp for its dependability and effectiveness.


LEARN HOW TO SET UP YOUR EMAIL CAMPAIGN. THEN LEARN HOW TO MAKE IT EFFECTIVE. BUILD PROFITABLE RELATIONSHIP. GET THE AWEBER HELP YOU NEED.

Knowing how to set up an email campaign is one thing. Learning how to make it effective is a completely different story. That's why this course also discusses practical strategies in email marketing, and shows you useful case studies to help you improve your subscription conversion rates. We'll also discuss writing subject lines that will make your subscribers want to open your email (as opposed to immediately marking it as SPAM before they read it), and writing crystal clear Calls to Action that will prompt your audience to proceed in the direction you would like them to. When done correctly, email marketing can be a win-win situation for both your business, and for your subscribers.


SAY WHAT? EMAIL MARKETING STATS THAT EFFECT YOU:

  • On average, you can make $43 for every dollar invested.
  • On average, about 44% of your email recipients will make at least one purchase based on a promotional email you send.

Remember, if you sign up for this course and are not 100% happy, you get a full refund within 30 days. No questions asked. It's both Udemy's and MY personal guareantee.

YOU READY? ENROLL AND LEARN HOW TO MAKE MORE MONEY FOR YOUR BUSINESS!
